member.name: T:nanoFramework.Networking.Sntp
member.summary: Provides a set of methods that help developers to manage the SNTP (Simple Network Time Protocol) client on the target device.
member.remarks: For a list of some public NTP servers, see this link : http://support.ntp.org/bin/view/Servers/NTPPoolServers

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Networking.Sntp.Start
member.summary: Starts the SNTP client. After this method returns a periodic call to the set SNTP servers is performed providing time synchronization. The system time is updated immediately after each successful execution. The time synchronization occurs on a hourly rate.
member.remarks: This method is specific to nanoFramework.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Networking.Sntp.Stop
member.summary: Stops the SNTP client. The time synchronization will stop.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Networking.Sntp.UpdateNow
member.summary: Performs an immediate request to synchronize time.
member.remarks: This performs a restart of the internal service.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.Networking.Sntp.Server1
member.summary: Gets, sets the address of the SNTP server 1.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.Networking.Sntp.Server2
member.summary: Gets, sets the address of the SNTP server 2.
